definition: "speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
grain that has begun to ripen/variant of 衹|只[zhi3]
classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc
to know/to recognize/to be familiar with/to get acquainted with sb/knowledge/understanding/awareness/cognition
variant of 標誌|标志[biao1 zhi4]
to get to know each other/acquaintance
to get to know sb/to meet sb for the first time
to gain first-hand knowledge of sth/to experience for oneself/knowledge/experience/insight

sentences.english: They say she plays guitar and cries and sings.
sentences.chinese: 大家都话她识弹结他，又识鬼咁叫同唱歌仔。

sentences.english: Who said, "The young do not know real depression."
That never knew the summer woods;
sentences.chinese: 将永远不识夏日的林树。

sentences.english: By the side of sickness health begos sweet.
sentences.chinese: 和疾病相较量，才能识得健康的可爱。

sentences.english: " The young do not sorrow taste".
This paper proposes a face recognition algorithm based on Fisherface method.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种基于费歇尔方法的人脸识算法。

sentences.english: Several years of difficult, not afraid of grave face, Li long.
sentences.chinese: 数载难见，人面不识，怕坟前久立。

sentences.english: Does not know the truth about the matter, just because the body in this mountain.
sentences.chinese: 不识庐山真脸孔，只缘身在此山中。

sentences.english: The teacher called me up and very angry to answer questions, "Hello knowledge matter?"
sentences.chinese: 老师很气就叫我起来回答问题“你好识啦？

sentences.english: The legend of "Gongye Chang could understand bird's language" began about 1500 or 1600 years ago.
sentences.chinese: “公冶长识鸟语”传说约产生于一千五六百年前。

sentences.english: How do you think your inability to recognize faces affected the development of your social life?
sentences.chinese: 你如何看待无法识认人面对你社交生活发展的影响？

sentences.english: Give me a field where the unmow'd grass grows.
sentences.chinese: 给我一片田野，那儿不识镰刀的草儿滋长。

sentences.english: He's never had any schooling, and even now can't read a single word.
sentences.chinese: 他从小没上过学，到现在瞎字儿不识。

sentences.english: Now again you abandon me, and are returning home. I do not know if hereafter I may expect to have another opportunity of seeing you.
sentences.chinese: 今又弃寡人而归，不识可以继此而得见乎？

sentences.english: Youth do not know real depression, but sadness is a kind of beautiful in my eyes.
sentences.chinese: 少年不识愁滋味，但是忧伤在我眼中是一种美丽。

sentences.english: Fire proves gold, adversity proves men. -- L. A.
sentences.chinese: Seneca烈火炼真金，逆境识真人。

definition: mind/state of mind/attention/(Chinese medicine) psychic constitution
to concentrate/to think what you're doing
main part/torso/the thing in itself/noumenon (object of purely intellectual perception according to Kant)
to comprehend (the nature of things etc)/to achieve enlightenment
divine light (around the Buddha)/a halo/a miraculous column of light/(slang) jolly good!
